data.text: @EU_Commission Anxious about kids  poisoned by #ecigs? Have a look in all those unlocked kitchen sink cabinets! No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Vous tracez le chemin de la révolte citoyenne - non a l'europe des lobbies #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU

@Eu_Commission investiguen, no se dejen comprar por los lobbys.
STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission sortez nos  #ecigs de la directive  tabac ?  avant qu'elles n'etouffent #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ecoutez ce que disent l'Aiduce & de nbx prof. de la santé, ils ne sont pas fous ! #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission @Europarl_DE  Lasst euch nicht vor den Karren der #WHO Gesundheitsterroristen spannen. Sie helfen NUR der Pharma! #EUecigban
@EU_Commission: Faule Kompromisse! Es gibt keinen Kompromiss zu Menschenrechtsverletzung und Lobbygesteuerter Phrasen!  NO #EUecigBAN !
@EU_Commission ma #ecigs un produit du tabac ? sorte la de la au plus vite avant qu'elle n'etouffe #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission 7 millions vapers in EU... you are sitting on a bomb ! Don't you realize? #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU
@EU_Commission ma #ecigs un produit du tabac ? et puis quoi encore #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Cigarettes kill millions, NRT kills hundeds and fail thousands. E Cigs don't kill or fail #EUecigban
@EU_Commission ma #ecigs un produit du tabac ?? non mais allo quoi ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Vous êtes assis sur une bombe, vous seuls pouvez éteindre la mèche ! #EUecigBAN #ecigs #EU

@EU_Commission you have no legal basis to ban #ecigs.
Try it! 
Lawyers queuing up to defend 12 million vapers.
Ditch article18
#EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you’re making Europe safe for cigarettes. It’s a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
@EU_Commission ma #ecigs dans une directive tabac ! non mais allo quoi ! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission ihr verkauft eure Seele an Big Tobaco und schert euch einen Dreck,was Demokratie eigentlich bedeutet. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission NEIN zum  #EUecigBAN  ,denn #ecigs bieten die Chance, das Leben eines Rauchers lebenswerter zu machen
@EU_Commission sortez nos #ecigs de la directive tabac ! non mais allo quoi ! #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission no seáis cómplices de este desastre.
STOP #EUecigBAN SAVE #ecigs
@EU_Commission @FDATobacco You're teaching us a valuable lesson on Public Health.  The #EUecigBAN sells out health for Big Tobacco profits
@EU_Commission sortez nos #ecigs de la directive tabac ! elles n'ont rien demandé !- #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission sortez nos #ecigs de la directive tabac ! vapoter n'est pas fumer ! - #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs STOP THE BAN NOW. THERE IS PLENTY OF TIME TO DO THE JOB CORRECTLY LATER #EUecigban
@EU_Commission how much safer can you make a product that even skeptics agree is 99% safer than cigarettes? #euecigban #ecigs”!
@EU_Commission sortez nos #ecigs de la directive tabac ! les asperges sont elles un produit de la métallurgie ? - #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Don't U think the past years of uncontrolled use without great incidences speak pro #ecigs? No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Why do you want to kill us so badly? FIGHT FOR US! STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission sortez nos #ecigs de la directive tabac !  - #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission stop the #EUecigBan!
@EU_Commission engaged in back-door #ecigs rulemaking, ignoring EU parliament vote. Shameful! #EUecigBAN #EU
@EU_Commission @Europarl_DE ihr wollt die Meinungfreiheit beschneiden nur um BigT und BigP Profite zu sichern? EU4Citizens?! no #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @euHvR @BarrosoEU It usually ends messily for European dictators. Choose life! Choose democracy! Say NO to the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission, drop #Art18 from the TPD. #Ecigs are NOT tobacco or medicinal, & are a far safer option for tobacco smokers. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Proposals for sealed unit #ecigs will have huge environmental impact. Allow refillable tanks and avoid this cost. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs Don't be frightened of e cigs. Sorry Lithuanea you will have to upset Phillip Morris  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission do you really want to look back later and say; We could've saved millions of people if we didn't ban #ecigs STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Wenn ihr die #ecigs wegreguliert, „spielt“ ihr mit dem Leben vieler Menschen. Das ist verwerflich. NEIN zum #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission respect the decision of @Europarl_EN ! #ecigs save lives. STOP #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission 
#EuEcigban  #ecig butt out of our lives. Merry Christmas EU. Now I'll have a good and long vape!
@EU_Commission @FDATobacco Why must the good be the enemy of the perfect? #Ecigs may look like smoking but save lives! Stop the #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs don't contain tobacco, so get them out of the #TPD #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission Ihr wollt die Gesundheit in der #EU fördern? Dann stoppt den #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @European8union @coe Don't le me DIE ! Save l'#ecig , please #EUecigBAN #ecigs
@Eu_Commission will die Meinungsfreiheit und den freien Handel einschränken, nicht mit uns! #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission : Nicotine is found in tomatoes, aubergine, papaya. Save us! Ban the tomato! #EUecigBAN #ecigs out of TPD
@EU_Commission Twitterbombs Thunderclaps are people power refuse to listen to us at your peril #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission @CNN  @BBC Nicorette Spray: 1mg Nic. pro Sprühstoß=150mg!! PRO for #ecigs !   No #EUecigBan
@EU_Commission #ecigs are a consumer product NO-ONE is ILL or DYING! Just a crusade against nicotine? it will not work #EUecigBAN Say NO
@EU_Commission Do you want to render #ecigs as useless as NRT? 96% failure rate? If so, carry on and keep ignoring us #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission  Vaping is not smoking #ecigs is not tobacco don't feed BigT remove article 18 out of TPD and you will save lives!
@EU_Commission Gout tabac, fruit, chocolat. Avec ou sans nicotine. A chacun sa vape #EUEcigBAN #Ecigs #EU .@afpfr .@mediapart
@EU_Commission AUCUN LOBBY ! les vapoteurs se battent pour eux-mêmes ! @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUEcigBAN
@EU_Commission, überlassen Sie den #Ecigs Markt nicht den Tabakkonzernen! Das ist nicht Sinn einer freien Marktwirtschaft! #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission no podéis para la revolución #vaping
#EUecigBAN SAVE #ecigs
@EU_Commission NO #EUecigBAN!
@EU_Commission #ecigs Do not stifle innovation.... it is the key to e cig success #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Mes enfants n'ont plus peur de me voir mourir depuis que je vapote #EUEcigBAN #Ecigs #EU

@EU_Commission @eucouncilpress 
#EuEcigban  #ecig Stop banning of the electronic cigarette!
@EU_Commission #euecigban If you don't watch us we watch you #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission enjoying your coffee whilst you deliberate our lives? caffeine is comparative nicotine in effect and harm #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission do you really want to look back later and say; We could've saved millions of people if we didn't ban #ecigs STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs You are heading for a health disaster of Nazi proportions Take E Cigs OUT OF THE TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission If #ecigs were gateway to smoking, kitchen knives are gateway to murder. No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission My health is more important than the wallet of big tobacco and pharma! Please think about it and say no to #EUecigBAN!
@EU_Commission у вас нет прав баннить #ecigs. Скажем НЕТ #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission a cigarette tue ! la ecig non ! @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecig #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission I enjoy nicotine - it's tobacco that I don't like. Don't force me to return to smoking. #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Will you accept responsability for millions of deaths? NO #EUecigBAN #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission #EUecigBAN Demokratie sieht anders aus als Verbote hinter verschlossenen Türen aushandeln!
@EU_Commission warum arbeitet ihr gegen jegliche wissenschaftliche Erkenntnisse über #ecigs? Nehmt Vernunft an! No EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs You will be killing millions of smokers if you don't allow then E cigs. Take them out of the TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission Must admire MEP's supporting the #ecigs TPD proposals. Going against 7m vapers, sorry VOTERS, is a brave position #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission you will be responsible for the biggest black market since American Prohibition. STOP the ban! #EUecigBan #EU #ecigs

@EU_Commission "You ask, What is our aim? Victory—for without victory there is no survival.” – Churchill  
get #ecigs out of TPD  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission: où est la santé publique dans vos décisions? les #ecigs sauvent des vies, ouvrez les yeux! #euecigban #ecigs #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission you’re making Europe safe for cigarettes. It’s a double negative: tough on #ecigs & harm reduction = easy on cigs & harm.
@EU_Commission we pay you to STOP the corruption, not to be corrupt.   NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission macht weiter so - und ihr werdet wegreguliert!!! NEIN zum #EuecigBan
@EU_Commission Nicorette Spray: 1mg Nik pro Sprühstoß, 150mg insg., keine Sorge wegen Überdosierung? Heuchelei!  No #EUecigBan #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission I know what Europe can do for me, I want to carry on using my #ecig!!!!!!Stop the #EUecigBAN !
@EU_Commission La mort du tabac dans 10 ans, vous ne la voulez pas.  Vous perdriez trop d'€... #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Unsere #Gesundheit war euch egal, als wir als #Raucher mit viel Geld Steuern gezahlt haben! Es reicht! NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission  Stoppez ces manigances !!! cessez d'interdire !!! pensez à la santé publique ! @mediapart @afpfr #eu #ecigs #EuecigBan
@EU_Commission #ecigs All the scientific details are out there. There is no need to ban them. TAKE THEM OUT OF TPD #EUecigban
@EU_Commission  où est la santé publique dans vos décisions ? la ecig sauve des vies, ouvrez les yeux ! @mediapart @afpfr  #ecigs #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission  La vape est un tsunami ... vous ne nous arrêterez pas ... @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN

@EU_Commission stoppt den #euecigban ! 
PRO #ecigs für unsere Gesundheit.  
No ##article_18 ! 

Danke von Millionen Dampfern...
@EU_Commission #ecigs JUST SAY NO TO THE E CIG BAN
@EU_Commission we do not pay you enough that you betrade us for Big T/P money? CORRUPTION #ecigs  NO #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission No #EUecigBAN #EU4citizens
@EU_Commission TPD is only good for BIG tobacco #ecigs  save lives No  #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Ergreift die Chance, die #ecigs bieten. #Artikel18 raus aus der #TRL, kein #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission We are #vapers. No matter what language we speak, or what country we're from. We stand united against #EUecigBAN #EU4Citizens
@EU_Commission Put health of citizens before money for a change. No #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission Reservez la directive contre le tabac ... AU TABAC ! et non à la ecig @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs
@EU_Commission @CNN  stop #EUecigBAN ! Vapers-Worldwide
@EU_Commission Millions of vapers or should I say voters, lost all trust in you! Would you like it back? STOP #EUecigBAN
@EU_Commission #ecigs time to leave the EU if this is what you call democracy #EUecigban
@EU_Commission les lobbies au parlement c'est la honte de la démocratie !!!  @mediapart @afpfr #eu #euecigban #ecigs #EUecigBAN
